## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description    | Type                                         | Default  |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `duration` | `duration` | Duration in ms | `number`                                     | `200`    |
| `show`     | `show`     | Show state     | `boolean`                                    | `true`   |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Variant        | `"collapse" \| "fade" \| "scale" \| "slide"` | `'fade'` |
